title: Alamogordo Blues
description: 2 sheets matted together as one continuous image; 2 rows of 3 men each, wearing goggles, white shirts, ties and dark pants, seated in Adirondack chairs and holding Polaroid cameras; Polaroid photos of mushroom clouds suspended from strings above men\'s heads; painted desert landscape with painted orange sky at right
creditline: Gift of funds from the Philip McMillan James Memorial
